description: Use optimized prompts to create beautiful art!
curatorsnotes: This is, hands down, my go-to image generator. Not only does it take your prompt in a first step and elaborates on it on your behalf in a first step. It also makes this prompt suitable for midjourney and then creates not one but four images from your prompt, always using another art style. Then it creates four new ideas based on your initial prompt that - for me at least - are always on point. If this GPT doesn't get a full score, I don't know which one does. It's creator describes the GPT even closer in this video.
